examples.example: 我经常和朋友们一起去参加各种有趣的活动。

translate.english: I often go to participate in various interesting activities with my friends.

examples.example: 我经常去图书馆看书，那里的氛围让我陶醉。

translate.english: I often go to the library to read books, and the atmosphere there intoxicates me.

examples.example: 我经常在闲暇时阅读书籍，这让我的生活更加充实和有意义。

translate.english: I often read books in my spare time, which makes my life more fulfilling and meaningful.
